# KLmisc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

KLmisc is a collection of functions for miscellaneous tasks in bioinformatic analyses.

## Installation

You can install KLmisc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("genomics-kl/KLmisc")
```
